title: Same Difference & Other Stories
description: After selling through the self-published run of Same Difference and Other Stories in just a few short months, Derek Kirk Kim proudly moves his debut collection to Top Shelf! Through a series of sensitive -- and often hilarious -- short stories, Kim deftly explores the not-so-average twenty-something's quarter-life crisis, romantic neurosis, and a refreshing slice of Korean-American life.Same difference --Hurdles --Puling --Super unleaded --Interview with a human --Emo Rock Hyung --Oliver Pikk --Valentine's Day --My Sistine Chapel --Shaft --Ungrateful appreciation --Sound --Island
author: Derek Kirk Kim
